title: THE OSCARS WATCH PARTY AT LITTLEFIELD (SPONSORED)
description: Celebrate Hollywood's Biggest Night with a live stream of the award ceremony featuring appearances from your favorite stars of the big screen, a red carpet, live performances during commercial breaks, a play-along drinking game, and your chance to win the Littlefield Oscars ballot and the 'Defying Gravity' Riff-Off. Suggested attire: Elevated PJs. Hosted by Jenny Gorelick with performances by various artists.
